author: Connell Smith
title: Saint John considers legal options to break no-layoff clauses
description: City management in Saint John is looking into a rarely used area of law to see if it can break no-layoff clauses in employee collective agreements in the event the municipality is hit with a COVID-19 related financial crisis.
